name: VIP Booster for 7 days
name_schinese: VIP 增益道具 7 日使用
description:
[h1][url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/291480/Warface_Clutch/?utm_source=steam_inventory_019#game_area_purchase][color=white]Log into [color=#ffc945]Warface: Clutch[/color] until [date]1720472399[/date] to get:
[/color][/url][/h1][list][*][color=white][h3]VIP Booster for 7 days[/h3][/color][/list]
[hr][/hr][url=https://steamcommunity.com/games/Warface/announcements/detail/4157465204017303148][color=#00aff4][b][u]A new season has kicked off! Check out:[/u][/b][/color][/url]
[color=lightgray][list][*]New seasonal activities: PvE, Ranked and prestige with exclusive rewards
[*]A new Battle Pass season
[*]A brand-new Free for All map
[/list][/color][hr][/hr]The gift is available only for Warface: Clutch Steam users. Once you log in, it'll be sent to your in-game inventory.
[hr][/hr]If you're having issues redeeming your item, try relaunching the game.
description_french:

[/color][/url][/h1][list][*][color=white][h3]Un booster VIP de 7 jours[/h3][/color][/list]
[hr][/hr][url=https://steamcommunity.com/games/Warface/announcements/detail/4157465204017303148][color=#00aff4][b][u]Une nouvelle saison a commencé ! Découvrez :[/u][/b][/color][/url]
[color=lightgray][list][*]De nouvelles activités saisonnières JcE, classées et de prestige aux récompenses exclusives

[/list][/color][hr][/hr]Ce cadeau n'est disponible que pour les utilisateurs Steam de Warface: Clutch. Une fois connecté, ce cadeau sera envoyé dans votre inventaire en jeu.
[hr][/hr]Si vous ne parvenez pas à récupérer votre objet, essayez de relancer le jeu.
